name: Pennytree
summary: Pennytree is a village in the Riverlands situated between two grassy hills known as the Teats. Pennytree is named for a huge old oak tree that grows by the duck pond, to which hundreds of copper pennies have been nailed. The village holdfast, as strong as any in the riverlands, has thick stone walls twelve feet high, behind which the people of Pennytree retreat at the sign of trouble.[1]
